law.catch_line: ** IN EFFECT UNTIL OCTOBER 1, 2013 PER CHAPTER 570 OF 2012**...
law.text:
** IN EFFECT UNTIL OCTOBER 1, 2013 PER CHAPTER 570 OF 2012**
The Board may adopt any policy to carry out this subtitle.
The Board shall have a plan to promote the services of the Fund to employers in the State.
As part of the plan, the Board may prepare a pamphlet about the Fund and provide copies to each county for distribution to businesses with personal property tax bills.
